title: The hymnes and songs of the Church diuided into two parts. The first part comprehends the canonicall hymnes, and such parcels of Holy Scripture as may properly be sung, with some other ancient songs and creeds. The second part consists of spirituall songs, appropriated to the seuerall times and occasions obserueable in the Church of England. Translated and composed, by G.W.
author: Wither, George, 1588-1667.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by the assignes of George Wither [i.e. John Bill] Cum priuilegio Regis regali,
